title: 14-Day Ban
body: The Ban that I was issued near two weeks ago isnt counting down on the timer so Im unsure if its already been two weeks and its glitched or if its just been 12 or 13 days.

replies.body: Looks like this account still has about 4 days left on that 14-day.
Still banned even though time shouldve ran out :/
Im having the same issue this man is. I checked to see if i received an email and i didn't, which is making it impossible to track how long ive been on suspension.
